Interface WebSocketFrameDecoder

All Superinterfaces:
ChannelHandler, ChannelInboundHandler
All Known Implementing Classes:
WebSocket00FrameDecoder, WebSocket07FrameDecoder, WebSocket08FrameDecoder, WebSocket13FrameDecoder
public interface WebSocketFrameDecoder extends ChannelInboundHandler
Marker interface which all WebSocketFrame decoders need to implement. This makes it easier to access the added encoder later in the ChannelPipeline.

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface ChannelHandler

    ChannelHandler.Sharable
